lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a prepared statement, Lloyds Bank chief executive Brian Pitman said the bank had a "relatively small position in these two overcrowded markets and we have decided to reallocate the resources to opportunities which promise a better return on our shareholders investment."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.K. Clearing banks have come under pressure to increase their provisions against bad loans to third world countries since Citibank announced plans to add three billion dlrs to its provisions in mid-May.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Most firms had held long positions on expectations that a return of the ruling Conservative party would prompt heavy demand.
